so companies that were very early

idea of traffic mirroring basically the
idea of traffic mirroring
is to apply the scientific method to
testing new releases so the process goes
you have a continuous integration
pipeline uh you go and you deploy it but
you try to limit the blast radius of a
failure so you got this new code you're
not sure if it's going to work so you
deploy it along with two replicas and
then you go and see how it performs
versus the replicas so you get kind of
this comparison chart you know to see

for twitter because twitter has a

stop when you reach this line of code go

it's very quick it's very efficient it's
